content: join a once in a lifetime cal commemorating the upcoming coronation of king charles lll designed exclusively for sirdar/hayfield by made by anita this is a 6 part cal featuring a assortment of uk crochet techniques and motifs that were inspired by king charles life and lineage there will be a new segment each week beginning on the 8th of march all info as well as an introduction by anita who reviews her design process and links to each segment are available here https //sirdar com/en/coronation-blanket-crochet-along this cal is free to all who wish to participate the instructions are in uk terminology so if you are unfamiliar with the differences between uk and us terms please take a moment to learn the differences there is also a facebook group for this cal - https //www facebook com/groups/4030850326951986 utm_source=coronation%20cal%20subscribers%202023&utm_campaign=52ccc69e6a-3_march_cal_free_copy_01&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_a9eb953dc6-52ccc69e6a-573797639 yarn used hayfield bonus dk a 012 cream - 4 balls b 698 ladybird - 1 ball c 610 cornflower - 1 ball d 569 gilt - 1 ball e 825 grass green or 603 fern green - 1 ball either shade f 840 purple or 551 neon purple - 1 ball either shade g 591 sky marl - 1 ball h 408 frost blue - 2 balls i 882 lime - 1 ball
